GET IN TOUCH
I can help residents on a range of issues, such as education, the environment, health and social services, highways, transport, and housing.
I would love to hear from you about what you think my priorities should be as your Cllr for Westcourt and what matters most to you.
Please use the contact form to get in touch with me. Please remember to provide as many details as possible, including your name, address and full details of your issue.

Congratulations to Katie Lam, the first MP for the Weald of Kent.
A huge thank you to everyone in the #wealdofkent for your support and for all who voted for the #change The Labour Party will bring in government. It is great to see so many fantastic Labour MPs in Kent.
My thanks to the amazing team of volunteers from Weald of Kent Labour and beyond in the community, those who endorsed me or hosted me for a visit. It has been great to find out more about your amazing work in the Weald of Kent.
I am extremely grateful for the advice, guidance and support from my agent David Ward and his wife Emma. For the late night calls, morning messages and looking after me, thank you both.
Finally and by no means least, thanks to my amazing wife and daughter, family and friends for being there throughout the campaign. I look forward to seeing a bit more of you all soon! ... See MoreSee Less

It was good to speak with Mike from Staplehurst He voted for the Conservatives before but has decided to Vote Labour at this General Election. It isn't just Lib Dems & Greens who have had enough of the Conservatives it is traditional Tory voters. The only party who can win against them in Weald of Kent is Labour.
www.getvoting.org/constituency/E14001570
The choice today is clear. Between a changed Labour Party that stands ready to restore politics to service and rebuild Britain.
Or a Tory party that crashed our economy, left public services in ruin, and now wants to give us Liz Truss 2.0 with more unfunded spending promises.
Mike knows he cannot afford five more years under the Conservatives and that #change will only happen if he votes Labour.
#VoteLabour #staplehurst #GE2024 #wealdofkent #TacticalVoting #labourdoorstep
